edu.purdue.bbc.util
Class PolarPoint2D

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.geom.Point2D
      java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double
          edu.purdue.bbc.util.PolarPoint2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class PolarPoint2D
extends Point2D.Double

A Class for extending Point2D to include Polar Coordinates. Although this class has public members x, y, r, and theta, it is not recommended to modify them directly, as this may have unpredictable results. Instead use the setLocation( ) and move( ) methods to manipulate the location of the point.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

PolarPoint2D

public PolarPoint2D(double r,
                    double theta,
                    boolean polar)
Creates a PolarPoint2D using polar notation with an origin at (0,0).

Parameters:
r - The r coordinate of the point in polar notation.
theta - The angle of the point from the origin (in radians).
polar - true if this point is being created with polar coordinates.

PolarPoint2D

public PolarPoint2D(double r,
                    double theta,
                    Point2D origin)
Creates a PolarPoint2D using polar notation with respect to the specified origin point.

Parameters:
r - The r coordinate of the point in polar notation.
theta - The angle of the point from the origin (in radians)
origin - The origin point for this PolarPoint2D

PolarPoint2D

public PolarPoint2D(double r,
                    double theta,
                    double originX,
                    double originY)
Creates a PolarPoint2D using polar notation with respect to the specified origin point.

Parameters:
r - The r coordinate of the point in polar notation.
theta - The angle of the point from the origin (in radians)
originX - The x coordinate of the origin point for this PolarPoint2D
originY - The y coordinate of the origin point for this PolarPoint2D

public void setLocation(double r,
                        double theta,
                        boolean polar)
Sets the location of this PolarPoint2D to the specified polar coordinates relative to the origin point.

Parameters:
r - The r coordinate of the new location.
theta - The angle theta of the new location.
polar - true if these coordinates are in polar notation.

move

public void move(Point2D p)
Moves this point by the specified distances. Effectively adds the x and y values of the passed in point to this point.

Parameters:
p - The point containing values to move this point by.

move

public void move(double r,
                 double theta,
                 boolean polar)
Moves this point by the specified distances.

Parameters:
r - The distance to move the PolarPoint2D from the origin.
theta - The amount to change the theta angle of the PolarPoint2D.
polar - true if these coordinates are in polar notation.

The theta angle of this PolarPoint2d.

scale

public void scale(double value)
Scales the r coordinate for this point, moving the point exactly this amount from the origin. For example, passing a value of 2 will move The PolarPoint2D such that it is exactly twice as far from the origin with the same theta value.

Parameters:
value - The amount to scale r by.

scale

public void scale(double xValue,
                  double yValue)
Scales the x and y coordinates of this point in relation to the point (0,0).

Parameters:
xValue - The amount to scale the x coordinate by.
yValue - The amount to scale the y coordinate by.
